member.name: T:Windows.UI.Composition.CompositionBatchTypes
member.summary: Batch types for CompositionCommitBatch and CompositionScopedBatch.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Composition.CompositionBatchTypes.InfiniteAnimation
member.summary: The batch contains an infinite animation.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.Composition.RectangleClip
member.summary: Represents a rectangle with optional rounded corners that clips a portion of a visual. The portion of the visual inside the rectangle is visible; the portion of the visual outside the rectangle is clipped.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Composition.RectangleClip.Left
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset from the left of the visual. The portion of the visual to the left of the edge defined by Left will be clipped. Animatable.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Composition.RectangleClip.Top
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset from the top of the visual. The portion of the visual above the edge defined by Top will be clipped. Animatable.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Composition.RectangleClip.Right
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset from the right of the visual. The portion of the visual to the right the edge defined by Right will be clipped. Animatable.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Composition.RectangleClip.Bottom
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset from the bottom of the visual. The portion of the visual below the edge defined by Bottom will be clipped. Animatable.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Composition.RectangleClip.TopLeftRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount by which the top left corner of the rectangle is rounded.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Composition.RectangleClip.TopRightRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount by which the top right corner of the rectangle is rounded.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Composition.RectangleClip.BottomRightRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount by which the bottom right corner of the rectangle is rounded.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Composition.RectangleClip.BottomLeftRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount by which the top right corner of the rectangle is rounded.

member.name: P:Uno.CompositionConfiguration.Configuration
member.summary: Configures the composition options for the whole application. Refer to uno's documentation to get more info about capabilities and impacts of composition for each platform.
member.remarks: Due to the nature of the core feature of composition, this flag must be set as soon as possible in your application startup. Changing configuration while the application is already running will result to an undefined behavior.

member.name: F:Uno.CompositionConfiguration.Options.Disabled
member.summary: Disables all composition supports in the application.

member.name: F:Uno.CompositionConfiguration.Options.UseCompositorThread
member.summary: [ANDROID ONLY] Use a dedicated background thread to render the views.

member.name: F:Uno.CompositionConfiguration.Options.Enabled
member.summary: Enables all composition capabilities for the current platform.
